metadata.synopsis: Annoyed at being interrupted while he's telling a story over a beer, this goblin wants to humiliate you in front of his lackeys.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game..2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto -75.79, 10.76, 439.884. Talk with Crusher

10.speaker: Crusher
10.text: There's a killer on the loose. You better run and hide - heard it's a coward lookin' for weaklings.
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin sneers.NodeContext: disgusted

23.speaker: Crusher
23.text: There's a killer on the loose. But don't worry. I'll find him and crush his skull.
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin sneers.NodeContext: disgusted

37.speaker: Crusher
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin sneers.NodeContext: disgusted

57.speaker: Crusher
57.text: ...thrashed 'is arm with my bare hands. Weaker than pixies, humans.
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: If possible, he should be holding mug of beer. He's talking to the other goblins. It would also be cool if he could somehow interact with the corpse on the ground by pointing at it or sneering down at it.NodeContext: This goblin is in the  telling a story to the other goblins. We join the conversation in the middle.

93.speaker: Crusher
93.text: And who're you? 'Nother pest? Everyone just barges in here, thinkin' they rule the world. Hah!

161.speaker: Narrator
161.text: *The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*

4.speaker: Narrator
4.text: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*

118.speaker: Player
118.text: Lot of assumptions here. I don't think I'm better than anyone else.

68.speaker: Crusher
68.text: Everyone says that. And then they spit in our faces.

62.speaker: Crusher
62.text: But no more. Things're changin'. We got the Absolute on our side now.
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: a slight smirk is forming.NodeContext: He's proud of this and wants to rub into our faces that he's better than us because of it.

136.speaker: Player
136.text: I don't just think so; it's a fact. You're nothing but dirt beneath my feet.
136.context: NodeContext: goblin is going to show he's the boss now.

21.speaker: Crusher
21.text: Well, not us. Things're changin'. We got the Absolute on our side now.
21.context: NodeContext: goblin is going to show he's the boss now.

176.speaker: Player
176.context: NodeContext: The player tried to turn away and he's calling out to them, annoyed.

159.speaker: Crusher
159.text: Think you can ignore us? Think you're so high and mighty? You're nothin'. Not compared to us.
159.context: NodeContext: The player tried to turn away and he's calling out to them, annoyed.

207.speaker: Crusher
207.text: We're pure. We got the Absolute on our side. An' we'll be the ones on top.
207.context: NodeContext: He's proud of this and wants to rub into our faces that he's better than us because of it.

239.speaker: Player
239.text: I'm your superior. You'd better show some respect.
239.context: NodeContext: He's scared - he just found out the player is of a much higher rank.

169.speaker: Player
169.text: I'm a True Soul. You'd better show some respect.
169.context: NodeContext: He's scared - he just found out the player is of a much higher rank.

117.speaker: Crusher
117.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*
117.context: NodeContext: He's scared - he just found out the player is of a much higher rank.

156.speaker: Narrator
156.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*
156.context: NodeContext: He's scared - he just found out the player is of a much higher rank.

14.speaker: Narrator
14.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*
14.context: NodeContext: He's scared - he just found out the player is of a much higher rank.

11.speaker: Crusher
11.text: F-forgive me! I 'ad no idea. The other True Souls are inside, planning an' such.
11.context: NodeContext: He's scared - he just found out the player is of a much higher rank.

133.speaker: Narrator
133.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*

134.speaker: Narrator
134.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*

85.speaker: Narrator
85.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

32.speaker: Narrator
32.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*

78.speaker: Narrator
78.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

213.text: Right. An' I'm a knobbly green dragon. We ain't stupid, ya know.

19.speaker: Crusher
19.text: Right. An' I'm a knobbly green dragon. We ain't stupid, ya know.

63.speaker: Crusher
63.context: NodeContext: He's coming up with a suitable punishment for the player's arrogance and enjoying it.

88.speaker: Crusher
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: He grins and plants his foot forward, nodding at it.NodeContext: bullying the player, he feels like they won't dare to refuse.

197.speaker: Crusher
197.text: Or I'll wipe that nasty look right off yer face.
197.context: NodeContext: He's challenging you. He fully believes you'll have to do it because he thinks he'll beat your ass.

27.speaker: Crusher
27.text: Or I'll wipe that nasty look right off yer dirty face.
27.context: NodeContext: He's challenging you. He fully believes you'll have to do it because he thinks he'll beat your ass.

222.speaker: Player
222.text: End him or leave him. But don't you dare grovel to this slug.
222.context: CinematicNodeContext: We are on our knees, the goblin is looking down at us. close-up of his foot: his nails are cracked and black with mud, but we should clearly see a ring glittering on his big left toe. Same as N173

194.speaker: Lae'zel
194.text: End him or leave him. But don't you dare grovel to this slug.
194.context: CinematicNodeContext: We are on our knees, the goblin is looking down at us. close-up of his foot: his nails are cracked and black with mud, but we should clearly see a ring glittering on his big left toe. Same as N173

50.speaker: Player
50.text: Ponder how it would taste to bite his toe clean off.
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: We are on our knees, the goblin is looking down at us. close-up of his foot: his nails are cracked and black with mud, but we should clearly see a ring glittering on his big left toe. Same as N173

174.speaker: Player
174.text: Ponder how it would taste to bite his toe clean off.
174.context: CinematicNodeContext: We are on our knees, the goblin is looking down at us. close-up of his foot: his nails are cracked and black with mud, but we should clearly see a ring glittering on his big left toe. Same as N173

216.speaker: Narrator
216.text: *You kneel before him, eagerly feigning reverence.*
216.context: CinematicNodeContext: We are on our knees, the goblin is looking down at us. close-up of his foot: his nails are cracked and black with mud, but we should clearly see a ring glittering on his big left toe. Same as N173

46.speaker: Crusher
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shows the dark urge grinning

130.speaker: Narrator
130.text: *But with one quick snatch, you envelop a toe in your foul maw.*

205.speaker: Crusher
205.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player stands up as Crusher is shouting

22.speaker: Narrator
22.text: *The toe itself tastes of curd cave-aged, with thick helpings of rancid gristle.*
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shows the DU moving their mouth awkwardly having enveloped Crusher's severed toe inside

0.speaker: Crusher
0.text: You fiend! Bah! Gaah! I'll teach you some respect.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Projectile toe goes towards Crusher's face

71.speaker: Player
71.text: Ignore your lust to eat the foot. Get down to lick it.

173.speaker: Crusher
173.text: Do I need to rip your earshells off? You heard me.

152.speaker: Player
152.text: We're on the same side. I've got the Absolute's brand.
152.context: NodeContext: He's a little displeased because you just proved you're of the same rank, and he can't bully you.

48.speaker: Crusher
48.text: Hmph. Still red. Looks like you're new, huh.
48.context: NodeContext: He's a little displeased because you just proved you're of the same rank, and he can't bully you.

192.speaker: Crusher
192.text: I'll let you off this once, but don't interrupt me again. Gotta learn to respect yer elders.
192.context: NodeContext: He's a little displeased because you just proved you're of the same rank, and he can't bully you.

153.speaker: Player
153.text: That disfigurement has its benefits, it seems.

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: That disfigurement has its benefits, it seems.

15.speaker: Player
15.text: Don't be so quick to judge. Every scar and sigil on my body serves a purpose - there's beauty in them.

218.speaker: Karlach
218.text: Don't be so quick to judge. Every scar and sigil on my body serves a purpose - there's beauty in them.

123.speaker: Karlach
123.text: Smart. You should get a few more pretty marks like mine. They're not just for show.

246.speaker: Astarion
246.text: I know we don't want to draw attention, but you could've at least bitten off a toe.

147.speaker: Wyll
147.text: Smart move. Let's go, before he offers a whiff of his behind.

100.speaker: Gale
100.text: Quick thinking! At least there's a silver lining to having yourself horribly scarred for life.

250.speaker: Lae'zel
250.text: You let him keep his foot? I'd have sliced it clean off.

122.speaker: Player
122.text: Follow the goblin's orders and kneel down - for now.
122.context: NodeContext: You just muttered an insult. The goblin is challanging you.

54.speaker: Player
54.text: I'd sooner spit in your face.
54.context: NodeContext: You just muttered an insult. The goblin is challanging you.

47.speaker: Crusher
47.context: NodeContext: You just muttered an insult. The goblin is challanging you.

98.speaker: Player
98.text: I said I'd spit in your face. Was that unclear, or do you need a demonstration?
98.context: CinematicNodeContext: We are on our knees, the goblin is looking down at us. close-up of his foot: his nails are cracked and black with mud, but we should clearly see a ring glittering on his big left toe.NodeContext: We muttered an insult, but after challenging us, we did what he wanted.

139.speaker: Player
139.text: Apologise and drop to your knees.
139.context: CinematicNodeContext: We are on our knees, the goblin is looking down at us. close-up of his foot: his nails are cracked and black with mud, but we should clearly see a ring glittering on his big left toe.NodeContext: We muttered an insult, but after challenging us, we did what he wanted.

82.speaker: Crusher
82.context: CinematicNodeContext: We are on our knees, the goblin is looking down at us. close-up of his foot: his nails are cracked and black with mud, but we should clearly see a ring glittering on his big left toe.NodeContext: We muttered an insult, but after challenging us, we did what he wanted.

233.speaker: Crusher
233.context: CinematicNodeContext: close-up of his foot: his nails are cracked and black with mud, but we should clearly see a ring glittering on his big left toe.NodeContext: condescending - he asked us to kiss his feet and we got on our knees.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: Kiss his foot and get it over with.
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Even though he's talking to the other goblins, he's still looking at the player, who is still on his knees. The surrounding goblins (3) cackle.NodeContext: He's talking to the other goblins, surprised you actually kissed his feet and he wants you to feel really bad about it.

3.speaker: Narrator
3.text: *As your lips touch the filthy flesh, you catch a whiff of... lavender?*
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Even though he's talking to the other goblins, he's still looking at the player, who is still on his knees. The surrounding goblins (3) cackle.NodeContext: He's talking to the other goblins, surprised you actually kissed his feet and he wants you to feel really bad about it.

140.speaker: Crusher
140.text: Ugh, didya see? They did it. Gross.
140.context: CinematicNodeContext: Even though he's talking to the other goblins, he's still looking at the player, who is still on his knees. The surrounding goblins (3) cackle.NodeContext: He's talking to the other goblins, surprised you actually kissed his feet and he wants you to feel really bad about it.

12.speaker: Player
12.text: It wasn't too bad. Do you use perfume?
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Breg laughs, but he's instantly silenced by a glare from crusher.

129.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
129.context: CinematicNodeContext: Breg laughs, but he's instantly silenced by a glare from crusher.

41.speaker: Crusher
41.text: What're you on about? Think yer bein' funny?
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player gets back up and crusher turns his glare on us.NodeContext: He's getting angry.

206.speaker: Player
206.text: Was that enough reverence for you?
206.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player gets back up after the first sentence.NodeContext: He's still bullying you. He's shown he's better than you and there's nothing you can do about it.

236.speaker: Crusher
236.text: Heh. Just about. But remember: you're nuffing 'ere.
236.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player gets back up after the first sentence.NodeContext: He's still bullying you. He's shown he's better than you and there's nothing you can do about it.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: You're braver than I've supposed. Wash your mouth if you get a chance.
31.context: NodeContext: Chk. Guttural sounding, a gith version of "tsk".

164.speaker: Shadowheart
164.text: You're braver than I've supposed. Wash your mouth if you get a chance.
164.context: NodeContext: Chk. Guttural sounding, a gith version of "tsk".

95.speaker: Karlach
95.text: Come on - let's get you a beer to wash the taste away.
95.context: NodeContext: Chk. Guttural sounding, a gith version of "tsk".

158.speaker: Astarion
158.text: Two hundred years of slavery, and that was still the most humiliating thing I've ever seen.
158.context: NodeContext: Chk. Guttural sounding, a gith version of "tsk".

16.speaker: Wyll
16.text: Gone gods, that was so foul I think even I can taste it.
16.context: NodeContext: Chk. Guttural sounding, a gith version of "tsk".

177.speaker: Lae'zel
177.text: You'd yield to a mere maggot? Chk. I didn't think you so depraved.
177.context: NodeContext: Chk. Guttural sounding, a gith version of "tsk".

187.speaker: Gale
187.text: Don't take this the wrong way, but I think I've just lost all respect for you.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: Grab his foot and lick it.
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin yelps and stumbles backwards. The other goblins start laughing. He sneers and looks around, realising the other goblins (3) are laughing at him, and becomes even angrier. The player gets back up.NodeContext: The 'what' is more of a yelp. There should be laughter after that from the other goblins. Then he composes himself. He's disgusted and seeting.

214.speaker: Crusher
214.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin yelps and stumbles backwards. The other goblins start laughing. He sneers and looks around, realising the other goblins (3) are laughing at him, and becomes even angrier. The player gets back up.NodeContext: The 'what' is more of a yelp. There should be laughter after that from the other goblins. Then he composes himself. He's disgusted and seeting.

36.speaker: Crusher
36.text: Think ya can mess with me, huh? Think yer bein' funny?
36.context: NodeContext: The goblin feels humiliated, but still wants to pretend he has the upper hand.

34.speaker: Crusher
34.context: NodeContext: The goblin feels humiliated, but still wants to pretend he has the upper hand.

182.speaker: Crusher
182.text: C'mere, just you, me, and my friends 'ere.
182.context: CinematicNodeContext: Beckons the player.NodeContext: This is an invitation for a fight. He's convinced he's going to beat us to pulp and looking forward to it.

181.speaker: Player
181.text: Give the foot a long lick.
181.context: CinematicNodeContext: We're at his feet still, so he's talking down to us. We get up during the last sentence.NodeContext: We've just kissed his feet for a long time. He's trying to humiliate us even further.

230.speaker: Player
230.text: Kiss his foot - and try to slide the ring off his toe.
230.context: CinematicNodeContext: We're at his feet still, so he's talking down to us. We get up during the last sentence.NodeContext: We've just kissed his feet for a long time. He's trying to humiliate us even further.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: Kiss his foot - and try to slide the ring off his toe.
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: We're at his feet still, so he's talking down to us. We get up during the last sentence.NodeContext: We've just kissed his feet for a long time. He's trying to humiliate us even further.

243.speaker: Narrator
243.text: *As your lips touch filthy flesh, you catch a whiff of... lavender?*
243.context: CinematicNodeContext: We're at his feet still, so he's talking down to us. We get up during the last sentence.NodeContext: We've just kissed his feet for a long time. He's trying to humiliate us even further.

87.speaker: Narrator
87.text: *As your lips touch filthy flesh, you catch a whiff of... lavender?*
87.context: CinematicNodeContext: We're at his feet still, so he's talking down to us. We get up during the last sentence.NodeContext: We've just kissed his feet for a long time. He's trying to humiliate us even further.

155.speaker: Narrator
155.text: *The pleasant scent gives way to the muddy taste of something you try not to identify. You carefully slide the ring off.*
155.context: CinematicNodeContext: We're at his feet still, so he's talking down to us. We get up during the last sentence.NodeContext: We've just kissed his feet for a long time. He's trying to humiliate us even further.

204.speaker: Crusher
204.text: You enjoyin' that? Disgustin' worm. Just remember: you're nuffing 'ere.
204.context: CinematicNodeContext: We're at his feet still, so he's talking down to us. We get up during the last sentence.NodeContext: We've just kissed his feet for a long time. He's trying to humiliate us even further.

189.speaker: Player
189.text: Impressive. Though I'm not sure I want to know why you're so skilled at... that.

125.speaker: Shadowheart
125.text: Impressive. Though I'm not sure I want to know why you're so skilled at... that.

203.speaker: Player
203.text: No? I want to hear every sordid detail.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: No? I want to hear every sordid detail.

119.speaker: Astarion
119.text: No? I want to hear every sordid detail.

247.speaker: Player
247.text: Let us leave it to your imagination, shall we?

8.speaker: Lae'zel
8.text: Let us leave it to your imagination, shall we?

120.speaker: Player
120.text: I think it's fairly obvious. And impressive.

209.speaker: Karlach
209.text: I think it's fairly obvious. And impressive.

196.speaker: Player
196.text: Well! I've never seen sleight of tongue quite like that before.

186.speaker: Gale
186.text: Well! I've never seen sleight of tongue quite like that before.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: I have... but that's a story for another time.

74.speaker: Player
74.text: I have... but that's a story for another time.

83.speaker: Karlach
83.text: I have... but that's a story for another time.

135.speaker: Player
135.text: Let us hope we don't see it again.

5.speaker: Lae'zel
5.text: Let us hope we don't see it again.

224.speaker: Player
224.text: Clever. I'd congratulate you if I could bear the sight of you.

9.speaker: Lae'zel
9.text: Clever. I'd congratulate you if I could bear the sight of you.

79.speaker: Player
79.text: Oh don't be like that. Not every problem has to be beaten to death, my dear.

84.speaker: Player
84.text: Oh don't be like that. Not every problem has to be beaten to death, my dear.

160.speaker: Astarion
160.text: Oh don't be like that. Not every problem has to be beaten to death, my dear.

190.speaker: Player
190.text: You're just jealous. I saw the way you looked at that foot.

108.speaker: Karlach
108.text: You're just jealous. I saw the way you looked at that foot.

175.speaker: Player
175.text: Nice, a free ring. Maybe wash it a few thousand times before trying it on.

157.speaker: Wyll
157.text: Nice, a free ring. Maybe wash it a few thousand times before trying it on.

107.speaker: Player
107.text: Or just dispose of the foul thing.

51.speaker: Player
51.text: Or just dispose of the foul thing.

215.speaker: Lae'zel
215.text: Or just dispose of the foul thing.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: Not bad. I would've taken the whole toe, but whatever works for you.

109.speaker: Astarion
109.text: Not bad. I would've taken the whole toe, but whatever works for you.

102.speaker: Player
102.text: Good gods. What else can you do with that tongue?

111.speaker: Karlach
111.text: Good gods. What else can you do with that tongue?

201.text: *As your lips touch filthy flesh, you catch a whiff of... lavender? It gives way to the muddy taste of something better left without description.*
201.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is still on his knees that the goblin's feet. In the middle of his sentence, the goblin looks down, and sees the ring dangling loosely around his toe.NodeContext: He's humiliating us, but gets interrupted

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *As your lips touch filthy flesh, you catch a whiff of... lavender? It gives way to the muddy taste of something better left without description.*
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is still on his knees that the goblin's feet. In the middle of his sentence, the goblin looks down, and sees the ring dangling loosely around his toe.NodeContext: He's humiliating us, but gets interrupted

25.speaker: Narrator
25.text: *Acrid sand grinds beneath your teeth as you try to snag the ring. The goblin jerks back his foot.*
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is still on his knees that the goblin's feet. In the middle of his sentence, the goblin looks down, and sees the ring dangling loosely around his toe.NodeContext: He's humiliating us, but gets interrupted

132.speaker: Crusher
132.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is still on his knees that the goblin's feet. In the middle of his sentence, the goblin looks down, and sees the ring dangling loosely around his toe.NodeContext: He's humiliating us, but gets interrupted

185.speaker: Crusher
185.text: You... stinkin' thief. I'll rip your fingers off.
185.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player gets up.NodeContext: We just stole his ring while pretending we were doing what he wanted. He's humiliated and angry, but still feels he has the upper hand.

163.speaker: Player
163.context: NodeContext: He's boasting to his friends.

245.speaker: Narrator
245.text: Told yeh humans have no spine.
245.context: NodeContext: He's boasting to his friends.

72.speaker: Crusher
72.text: See? All bite an' no bark.
72.context: NodeContext: He's boasting to his friends.

141.speaker: Player
141.text: This is too much. Get back up.

179.speaker: Player
179.text: I said you have... a fearsome face.

235.speaker: Crusher
235.text: I should bash your teeth in. Yeah, think I will.
235.context: NodeContext: Displeased, but looking forward to the prospect of beating us up.

92.speaker: Player
92.text: How about you kiss my feet instead?
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin takes a step back, looks at your weapons, and turns away.NodeContext: We intimidated him, he's trying to shrug us off.

45.speaker: Player
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin takes a step back, looks at your weapons, and turns away.NodeContext: We intimidated him, he's trying to shrug us off.

49.speaker: Crusher
49.text: Errgh... look, mate. Just piss off. You're not welcome 'ere.
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin takes a step back, looks at your weapons, and turns away.NodeContext: We intimidated him, he's trying to shrug us off.

58.speaker: Crusher
58.text: Errgh... look, mate. Just piss off. You're not welcome 'ere.
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin takes a step back, looks at your weapons, and turns away.NodeContext: We intimidated him, he's trying to shrug us off.

232.speaker: Player
232.text: I know you're planning to take over. I wonder what your boss will think of that.
232.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin stutters and stares, then falls on his knees.NodeContext: You just read his mind and warned him you'd report his traitorous thoughts if he doesn't kiss your feet. Tnak is a goblin word, meaning damn it (pronounced tuh-NACK.).

200.speaker: Crusher
200.text: What - how did you? Tnak. Fine.
200.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin stutters and stares, then falls on his knees.NodeContext: You just read his mind and warned him you'd report his traitorous thoughts if he doesn't kiss your feet. Tnak is a goblin word, meaning damn it (pronounced tuh-NACK.).

112.speaker: Narrator
112.text: *His lips smack together wetly and leave a trail of saliva on your foot.*
112.context: NodeContext: He just had to kiss our feet. He's disgusted, but doesn't want to show how humiliated he feels.

60.speaker: Crusher
60.context: NodeContext: He just had to kiss our feet. He's disgusted, but doesn't want to show how humiliated he feels.

180.speaker: Crusher
180.context: NodeContext: This is mumbled to himself.

198.speaker: Player
198.text: Not so high and mighty, after all.

66.speaker: Crusher
66.text: Don't push it, worm. I can still bash yer face in. Yeah, I think I will.

219.speaker: Player
219.text: You better kiss my foot. Now.
219.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin is stunned for a moment, then falls to his knees.NodeContext: grovelling. He realised he was talking down to someone of higher status.

38.speaker: Player
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin is stunned for a moment, then falls to his knees.NodeContext: grovelling. He realised he was talking down to someone of higher status.

39.text: *The goblin stares, mouth agape. Then he sets his jaw and falls to his knees.*

217.speaker: Narrator
217.text: *The goblin stares, mouth agape. Then he sets his jaw and falls to his knees.*

193.speaker: Player
193.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin is stunned for a moment, then falls to his knees.NodeContext: grovelling. He realised he was talking down to someone of higher status.

165.speaker: Player
165.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin is stunned for a moment, then falls to his knees.NodeContext: grovelling. He realised he was talking down to someone of higher status.

24.speaker: Crusher
24.text: I'm sorry, True Soul, ma'am. I didn't realise.
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin is stunned for a moment, then falls to his knees.NodeContext: grovelling. He realised he was talking down to someone of higher status.

168.speaker: Crusher
168.text: I'm sorry, True Soul. I didn't realise.
168.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin is stunned for a moment, then falls to his knees.NodeContext: grovelling. He realised he was talking down to someone of higher status.

99.speaker: Narrator
99.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*
99.context: CinematicNodeContext: He stands back up, lips curling in disgust.NodeContext: grovelling, but he's also disgusted.

75.speaker: Narrator
75.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*
75.context: CinematicNodeContext: He stands back up, lips curling in disgust.NodeContext: grovelling, but he's also disgusted.

70.speaker: Narrator
70.text: *His lips smack together wetly and leave a trail of saliva on your foot.*
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: He stands back up, lips curling in disgust.NodeContext: grovelling, but he's also disgusted.

150.speaker: Crusher
150.context: CinematicNodeContext: He stands back up, lips curling in disgust.NodeContext: grovelling, but he's also disgusted.

166.speaker: Narrator
166.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*

76.speaker: Narrator
76.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*

231.speaker: Narrator
231.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

188.speaker: Narrator
188.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*

225.speaker: Narrator
225.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

144.text: You want yer teeth knocked in? I can do that.
144.context: CinematicNodeContext: The other goblins (3) cackle menacingly.NodeContext: displeased, but looking forward to beating us up.

124.speaker: Crusher
124.text: You want yer teeth knocked in? I can do that.
124.context: CinematicNodeContext: The other goblins (3) cackle menacingly.NodeContext: displeased, but looking forward to beating us up.

237.speaker: Crusher
237.text: I don't think so. I think I'll break your legs instead.
237.context: CinematicNodeContext: The other goblins (3) cackle menacingly.NodeContext: displeased, but looking forward to beating us up.

184.speaker: Player
184.context: NodeContext: This is his revenge fantasy. We are hearing his thoughts.

67.speaker: Crusher
67.text: Just wait. I'll be next in line to become a True Soul. Then nobody can stop me.
67.context: NodeContext: This is his revenge fantasy. We are hearing his thoughts.

146.speaker: Crusher
146.text: Just wait. I'll be next in line to become a True Soul. Then nobody can stop me.
146.context: NodeContext: This is his revenge fantasy. We are hearing his thoughts.

33.speaker: Crusher
33.text: I'll kick out that annoyin' hobgoblin. The priestess an' drow, too. An' everyone'll have t'obey me.
33.context: NodeContext: This is his revenge fantasy. We are hearing his thoughts.

154.text: What're you tryin' to pull? You tryin' to get in my head? I'll kill ya!
154.context: NodeContext: Very angry. We just tried to read his thoughts and he feels threatened, so he's lashing out.

17.speaker: Crusher
17.text: What're you tryin' to pull? You tryin' to get in my head? I'll kill ya!
17.context: NodeContext: Very angry. We just tried to read his thoughts and he feels threatened, so he's lashing out.

42.text: You want yer teeth knocked in? You ain't got nothin' on me. So kiss my foot.
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: He laughs loudly. He motions to his foot again.NodeContext: The goblin laughs before he talks. We tried to intimidate him but failed, now he's trying to intimidate us.

202.speaker: Crusher
202.text: You want yer teeth knocked in? You ain't got nothin' on me. So kiss my foot.
202.context: CinematicNodeContext: He laughs loudly. He motions to his foot again.NodeContext: The goblin laughs before he talks. We tried to intimidate him but failed, now he's trying to intimidate us.

86.speaker: Player
86.text: Follow the goblin's orders and kneel down - for now.
86.context: CinematicNodeContext: The other goblins (3) cackle menacingly.NodeContext: He's going to beat us up after we didn't do as we were told.

73.speaker: Player
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: The other goblins (3) cackle menacingly.NodeContext: He's going to beat us up after we didn't do as we were told.

191.speaker: Crusher
191.text: Fine. A fist to yer mouth it is.
191.context: CinematicNodeContext: The other goblins (3) cackle menacingly.NodeContext: He's going to beat us up after we didn't do as we were told.

56.speaker: Player
56.text: Well? Go on, give him a nibble.

52.speaker: Astarion
52.text: Well? Go on, give him a nibble.

30.speaker: Player
30.text: I feel I should warn you that the average goblin foot is host to some two dozen toe-curling diseases.

131.speaker: Gale
131.text: I feel I should warn you that the average goblin foot is host to some two dozen toe-curling diseases.

145.speaker: Player
145.text: Kiss the damn foot. Worse things have been shoved in your face lately.

228.speaker: Shadowheart
228.text: Kiss the damn foot. Worse things have been shoved in your face lately.

55.speaker: Player
55.text: Blech. I'd rather drink the Baldur's Gate sewers dry.

101.speaker: Wyll
101.text: Blech. I'd rather drink the Baldur's Gate sewers dry.

94.speaker: Player
94.text: Little tyrant. Teach him some manners.

90.speaker: Karlach
90.text: Little tyrant. Teach him some manners.

171.speaker: Player
171.text: I'm your superior. You'd better show some respect.

138.speaker: Player
138.text: I'm a True Soul. You'd better show some respect.

106.speaker: Narrator
106.text: *As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*

244.speaker: Crusher
244.text: And what're you doin' 'ere with that stink on yer face? Think you can do whatever you want?

143.speaker: Crusher
143.text: Think you rule the world, huh?

59.speaker: Crusher
59.text: 'Scuse me. The other drow are inside. Planning an' such.
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin gives a very small nod on the excuse me, then motions to the right with his head when the says the drow are inside.NodeContext: He's talking to someone who is higher in rank, and he doesn't like it, but doesn't really want to start a fight.

149.speaker: Crusher
149.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin sneers and hold out his foot.NodeContext: He asked us to kiss his feet, we ran away, and now we've come back. He wants to humiliate us some more.

96.speaker: Crusher
96.context: NodeContext: Smug. He wants us to kiss his feet and there's nothing we can do about it (or so he thinks)

61.speaker: Player
61.text: Kneel down in front of him.
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Another close-up of his foot, just to remind us how gross it is.NodeContext: condescending

240.speaker: Crusher
240.context: CinematicNodeContext: Another close-up of his foot, just to remind us how gross it is.NodeContext: condescending

44.speaker: Player
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin steps closer before the player can move.NodeContext: Displeased

172.speaker: Crusher
172.text: Gonna run again? Think you can waste my time like that?
172.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin steps closer before the player can move.NodeContext: Displeased

167.speaker: Crusher
167.context: NodeContext: Trying not to upset you.

234.speaker: Crusher
234.context: NodeContext: You licked the goblins foot, so the goblin is very disgusted and doesn't want to see you.
